title: Forgotten email??
body:
Hi,

I have an older account that I used that I've forgotten the email to.  I remember the summoner name, but I couldn't remember the password. Obviously I tried resetting the password, but I genuinely cannot remember which email I had.

I was going to submit a ticket for account recovery, but honestly I'm not sure this is the right ticket, as it's not for this specific account.

Any help in recovering this account?

replies.body:
Hey there,

Yep, a ticket relating to Account Recovery would be the correct course of action here, just mention its for an alternate account than the one you're submitting the ticket from within the ticket itself.
Great, thanks for the info amte.
